00009 domstring(const xmlChar *s) {
00010         DOMString d((char *)s);
00011         return d;

00024 bool
00025 MMLReader::parse(const DOMString &buf) {
00026         if (doc) {
00027                 delete doc;
00028                 doc = 0;
00029         }
00030         if (buf.length() == 0) {
00031                 err = "buffer is empty";
00032                 return true;
00033         }
00034         doc = new MMLDocument();
00035         cur = doc;
00036         int ret=0;
00037         ok = false;
00038 
00039     const char *cb = buf.utf8();
00040         xmlParserInputBufferPtr b =
00041                         xmlParserInputBufferCreateMem(cb, buf.length(), XML_CHAR_ENCODING_UTF8);
00042         reader = xmlNewTextReader(b, 0);
00043         if (reader != NULL) {
00044                 xmlTextReaderSetErrorHandler(reader, MMLReader::errorHandler,
00045                                 this);
00046                 ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
00047                 ok = true;
00048                 while (ok && ret == 1) {
00049 //                      printf("continue reading\n");
00050                         processNode();
00051                         if (ok) {
00052                                 ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055                 xmlFreeTextReader(reader);
00056                 if (ret != 0) {
00057                         printf("failed to parse XML: %i\n", ret);
00058                         printf("ok: %i\n", ok);
00059                 }
00060         }
00061         xmlFreeParserInputBuffer(b);
00062         if (ok) {
00063                 ok = doc->validate();
00064                 if (!ok) {
00065                         err = doc->errorMsg();
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         return ok;
00069 }
00070 MMLDocument *
00071 MMLReader::document() {
00072         MMLDocument *d = doc;
00073         doc = 0;
00074         return d;

00076 void
00077 MMLReader::freeOld() {
00078         if (name) xmlFree(name);
00079         if (value) xmlFree(value);
00080 }
00081 void
00082 MMLReader::processNode() {
00083         /* handling of a node in the tree */
00084         freeOld();
00085 
00086         name = xmlTextReaderName(reader);
00087         if (name == NULL) {
00088                 name = xmlStrdup(BAD_CAST "--");
00089         }
00090         value = xmlTextReaderValue(reader);
00091         depth = xmlTextReaderDepth(reader);
00092         empty = xmlTextReaderIsEmptyElement(reader);
00093         nodetype = xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader);
00094 
00095         switch (nodetype) {
00096         case 0: // NONE
00097                 break;
00098         case 1: // ELEMENT
00099 //              printf("start element %s\n", name);
00100                 ok = startElement();
00101                 break;
00102         case 2: // ATTRIBUTE
00103 //              printf("attribute %s\n", name);
00104                 ok = attribute();
00105                 break;
00106         case 3: // TEXT
00107 //              printf("text: %s\n", value);
00108                 ok = text();
00109                 break;
00110         case 4: // CDATA
00111                 break;
00112         case 5: // ENTITY_REFERENCE
00113                 break;
00114         case 6: // ENTITY
00115                 break;
00116         case 7: // PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION
00117                 break;
00118         case 8: // COMMENT
00119                 break;
00120         case 9: // DOCUMENT
00121                 break;
00122         case 10: // DOCUMENT_TYPE
00123                 break;
00124         case 11: // DOCUMENT_FRAGMENT
00125                 break;
00126         case 12: // NOTATION
00127                 break;
00128         case 13: // WHITESPACE
00129                 break;
00130         case 14: // SIGNIFICANT_WHITESPACE
00131                 break;
00132         case 15: // END_ELEMENT
00133 //              printf("end element %s\n", name);
00134                 ok = endElement();
00135                 break;
00136         case 16: // END_ENTITY
00137                 break;
00138         case 17: // XML_DECLARATION
00139                 break;
00140         default:
00141                 break;
00142         }
00143         if (!ok) {
00144                 std::cerr << "Error: " << err.utf8() << std::endl;
00145         }
00146 }
00147 bool
00148 MMLReader::startElement() {
00149         openel = doc->createElement(domstring(name));
00150         if (openel) {
00151                 cur->appendChild(openel);
00152                 ok = true;
00153                 while (ok && xmlTextReaderMoveToNextAttribute(reader)) {
00154                         processNode();
00155                 }
00156                 if (openel->attributesValid()) {
00157                         cur = openel;
00158                         ok = true;
00159                 } else {
00160                         ok = false;
00161                         err = openel->errorMsg();
00162                         cur = NULL;
00163                 }
00164         } else {
00165                 ok = false;
00166                 err = doc->errorMsg();
00167                 printf("error: %s", (const char*)err.utf8());
00168                 // read failed: clear all
00169                 cur = NULL;
00170         }
00171         return ok;
00172 }
00173 bool
00174 MMLReader::endElement() {
00175         bool valid;
00176         valid = cur->validate();
00177         if (!valid) {
00178                 err = "Tag '";
00179                 err += (const char*)name;
00180         err +="' is not valid: ";
00181                 err += cur->errorMsg();
00182         }
00183         cur = cur->parentNode();
00184         return valid;
00185 }
00186 bool
00187 MMLReader::attribute() {
00188         DOMString ds = domstring(name);
00189         openel->setAttribute(ds.utf8(), domstring(value));
00190         return true;
00191 }
00192 bool
00193 MMLReader::text() {
00194         bool valid = true;
00195         DOMString ch(domstring(value));
00196         ch.normalize();
00197         if (ch.length() > 0) {
00198                 MMLText *t;
00199                 MMLNode *n = cur->lastChild();
00200                 if (n && n->isText()) {
00201                         t = static_cast<MMLText *>(n);
00202                         t->appendData(ch);
00203                 } else {
00204                         t = doc->createTextNode(ch);
00205                         cur->appendChild(t);
00206                 }
00207                 valid = cur->validate();
00208                 if (!valid) {
00209                         err = cur->errorMsg();
00210                 }
00211         }
00212         return valid;
00213 }
00214 void
00215 MMLReader::errorHandler(void *arg, const char *msg,
00216                 xmlParserSeverities, xmlTextReaderLocatorPtr) {
00217         MMLReader *r = static_cast<MMLReader *>(arg);
00218         r->err = msg;
00219     printf("XML error: %s\n", r->err.utf8());
00220 }
